text.div:
personIdSearchParameter

Parameter _id:token

Searches based on the exact UUID of the person record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?_id={uuid}

ResourcePerson
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesPerson
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: personIdSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the exact UUID of the person record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?_id={uuid}
